website_summaries.verdict: A medium-soft boar's hair brush gentle enough for dogs with thin or delicate coats, including chihuahuas, Yorkies, spaniels.
pros: Good for many dog breeds and also cats
Removes dead hair and spreads natural oils through fur
Bristles won't break or fall out
cons: You'll have to comb or pick hair out of the brush

customer_reviews.title: Best brush for short haired dogs.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect brush for my 2 Smooth Coat Chihuahuas! After wasting money on several other brushes, I am so glad I tried this one. My Chihuahuas need to be brushed but they are more delicate than larger dogs and the other brushes I tried were too harsh for them to enjoy the brushing. The one who hated being brushed now sits there with the look of ecstasy on her face. lol
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly as described! Only complaint I have is that it's a little smaller than what I was expecting. The wooden handle is about 4.25 inches long, which fits in my hand but is just a bit smaller than I was anticipating. The bristles are about 0.75 inch long and are firm but have enough give to them as to not be 'pokie'. My dog LOVES it and it makes her coat super shiny and soft! She now gets so excited when I get it out and show it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: High quality, cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this brush! It's perfectly palm sized for me, so easy to hold- the bristles feel really secure and high quality. Haven't had any come loose yet. If I hold the brush out my cat will rub her face on it- she loves it that much. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush because I thought it was small enough to get around my 9 lb dog's face safely. It isn't, but it sure does the job on the rest of him. He's a mixed breed with, by the looks of his hair and his size, some Yorkie in him so his hair is fairly long. He lies still for this brush and when I'm finished with one side, he rolls over for me to brush the other side. I'll get a toothbrush to do around his muzzle and eyes. My dog loves it and I love it. The amazing thing is that I brushed him about four hours ago and his hair is still pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lake

customer_reviews.title: From Russia with love, indeed
customer_reviews.text: I got this brush for my delicate 3 year old cat. He has short, thin hair, so normal brushes seem to tire him quickly. This brush works quite nicely; it does manage to remove some hair, and it does not dig deep into his fur so he doesn't seem to get tired or feel any pain. The brush is of a lighter color than the pictures, and does have the legend 'From Russia with Love' on red ink, on the back. That wasn't completely expected. But other than that it's a great brush.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Not what was described
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product on the web stated it had soft board hair bristles. They are not boars hair and most definitely not soft. I was sent a product by a different distributor and different description. LA Beauty Labs 4.1 out of 5 stars 79 Reviews Cat Brush & Dog Brush for Short and Medium Hair, Soft Reinforced Boar Bristle to Distribute Natural Oils, Condition the Coat and to Add Gloss and Shine to it, Pet Grooming Naturally, Brown 4.25"
customer_reviews.author: BJ Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: Well-made dog brush works great and dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our doggie girl loves this. We'd been using a cool gizmo that has comb-like teeth and an ejection button for her fur, and that works great when in shedding mode, but this is soothing for her for more frequent use. She was experiencing some itchiness the vet thought was dry skin, so this has helped to distribute oils in her coat. Well made, too! I expect this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Madison

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Like this brush a lot. It's soft and the dog doesn't seem to mind it like the metal bristle ones. It makes her hair fluffy and soft. Doesn't get out knots, but using it everyday seems to limit the knots that she gets. It fits well in your hand and easy to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Lemndrp

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful brush. .
customer_reviews.text: It's a combination of a slicker and a pin brush with the easy clean feature. It's compact with a "head" that measures roughly 2.5 x 1.5 inches. It's wonderful for leg, underarm and tail areas of large animals and over all for cat sized animals. I have purchased this twice now, once as a gift. I would not hesitate to get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for short haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very short, fine hair. This is like plastic bristles spaced very far apart. It does not grab any of her hairs at all. Might work for a longer haired dog, but definitely not short hair. Seems very cheaply made and is completely useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Short-hair cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My domestic short hair tabby loves when I brush him with this! He prefers to be petted gently, and these bristles give the right amount of cushion to allow me to brush him vigorously (which he also likes) but still use a tender touch. I can also brush him with or against the grain, and he enjoys it because the brush is so gentle. I brushed him until my arm was sore, and he still wanted more. I have the Furminator brush, and he tries to bite at that or gets annoyed with it pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia S.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING brush for my American Pitbull Terrier rescue pup!
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted a little American Pitbull Terrier from a city shelter. He has the shortest fur and of my dogs ever had. I did extensive research on what brushes are best for his breed and made the decision to purchase this one as 1 of 2. He LOVES it and so do I! It help puts the "finishing shine" on his coat. As soon as he sees it in my hand, he immediately sits and waits for me to get to work!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Z

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't like being wiped down or anything like that but she ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like being wiped down or anything like that but she LOVES being brushed by this brush. I gave 4 instead of 5 because i wish it trapped fur better but just keep in mind that is not the purpose of this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi L. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great soft brush for my short hair cat!
customer_reviews.text: I had only been using one of the flea comb brushes for my cat before this, and knew I needed something softer that was gentler on her coat. This was the perfect choice! It feels sturdy in my hand when I'm brushing her, and she looooves the daily brushing with this brush. I've gotten compliments from guests on how soft her coat is, and I'd like to think this brush is part of the trick!
customer_reviews.author: S. Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good results, good price. Delivered what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for more in a brush. Some comments here say it's too small but for me and my pups it's perfect. I have chihuahuas. There all shorthair. One is a 7 pounder and the other two run 10 pounds. The brush isn't too stiff and leaves their coat shiny. The price was good and was a prime deal so no additional ship fee. Were all very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty (domestic shorthair) literally cannot decide if he likes this brush or catnip more. He'll come up to me once a day and meow until I brush him. I use it in combination with MIU deshedding brush to help with his shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Calin C.

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly good for dogs with sensitive skin since it doesn't scratch
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my dogs fur becoming shiner and healthier! Defiantly good for dogs with sensitive skin since it doesn't scratch them
customer_reviews.author: Pete H.

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality brush, bristles are nice. Cats love it on their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Julia B Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really too much for my dogs hair. It doesn't have enough grip to really get much hair off of them. They all have thinner short hair. It does a little bit but is not at the level I need for a good brushing.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is perfect for my little short haired Chiweenie! The brush is soft and yet firm enough to give her a good brushing! Very well made, no shed of brush bristles. Very nice value, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Rio off!!! ClnChico 2
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste ur money. I have a small dog, n brush is still 2 lil. Pls it's not boar hair, n they are falling out after 1st brushing. Thx n Blessed day. ClnChico 2
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Suter

customer_reviews.title: You only get 1 brush
customer_reviews.text: I thought from the photo it was 3 brushes. But $21 for one brush is a scam. It is small and not that soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lanora.rae

customer_reviews.title: ... up to being brushed but this brush does a great job on her hair
customer_reviews.text: My dog still hasn't warmed up to being brushed but this brush does a great job on her hair, leaving it soft and smooth. Once or twice a week I use a furminator to clean out her coat and I use this brush more on a daily basis to keep her coat looking good.
customer_reviews.author: jared harris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase this brush, you’ll waste your time.!!!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically needed a brush for my short haired dog that sheds way more than my 2 Bengal cats. I used the brush on my dog and it didn’t even remove one hair !!!!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worst brush everrrr:(. Absolutely not worth half the price. Hard plastic ‘bristles’ scratch and face does not retract enough to remove the hair.
customer_reviews.author: MARJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy on their skin and my Frenchies actually stay and ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy on their skin and my Frenchies actually stay and love being brushed so I know they like it. Very gentle on their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guzikowski

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my chihuahua/mini dachshund mix puppies! I wanted something soft enough to not hurt but do the job and this works just as I wanted. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrylee

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: This brush is not very big, but it works pretty well for our medium sized dog (45lbs). He is a pit viszla mix with short red hair and this brush gives his coat a beautiful shine. He used to hate being brushed but I think this brush has changed his mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this brush for any short-haired fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush for my chihuahua, and he loves it! My cat also loves to come and rub his face on the brush!
customer_reviews.author: Alidazoe

customer_reviews.title: Item received is a fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product as was described. This is a cheap plastic brush made in China. No boar bristle is on this brush. It is plastic and scratches your dog. This product is described as being LA brand made in Russia
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: Wood base cracked when brush was washed.
customer_reviews.text: Very small brush which was fine, but the wood cracked in multiple places after washing the brush. The brush was in water for just a few minutes, long enough to wash, the base cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And she looks better! Highly recommended - good for brushing and all ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brush! She stretches out and lets me reach everywhere. Even afterwards we are more affectionate and loving with each other. And she looks better! Highly recommended - good for brushing and all that, but beyond - good for your relationship with your dog!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great brush for a dog with short hair or sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Angel J. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Like this brush
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kitty brush. My cat has short hair, but he still sheds a lot. This brush does a good job of removing excess hair, and the cat likes the gentle bristles.
customer_reviews.author: leafycritter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute well made brush for short hair dogs. Just right for my smooth coated Doxie.
customer_reviews.author: RMBM

customer_reviews.title: A nice and very soft brush
customer_reviews.text: A nice and very soft brush, my rescued pup with soft hair seems to like it a lot and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Save some $ and buy a much better brush at Sally Beauty for about $3
customer_reviews.text: Not much to this brush. It feels incomplete. Save some $ and buy a much better brush at Sally Beauty for about $3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too soft
customer_reviews.text: the bristles were too soft, it would grab the cat hair even tho he is shedding and it comes off easy
customer_reviews.author: tessa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush is too soft to do any good on my Maltese's hair.
customer_reviews.author: MemeRocks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 boxer dogs! They love to be brushed with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Talia P.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and my cats love it! Keeps their coats glossy and healthy
customer_reviews.author: Cersei

customer_reviews.title: cat brush
customer_reviews.text: Did a pretty good job, but not enough dead hair removal . Cat ;loved it on her face, but not the rest of her body.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly the type of brush I was looking for and the cat seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: As described; It's exactly the type of brush I was looking for and the cat seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's a good brush for little short haired dogs. I use mine daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for daily brushing.
customer_reviews.text: Nice small brush. We use it daily on our Bull Terrier, and it keeps her coat nice and glossy, and her smelling nice and looking like a show dog.
customer_reviews.author: Deadeye

customer_reviews.title: My Cats let me brush them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush!!!! My cats actually let me brush them!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lichelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: quite easy to use. clean pet's feet easily and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: KoalaInGTR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for the finishing touch on somewhat short to short coats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My doberman loves this brush. Rolls over to let me brush his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: My very picky dog loves this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog who normally wiggles and squeals when I try to brush her. This is the first brush she seems to actually like! Awesome, traditional quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product just as described - high quality - would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Parisian628

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's almost too soft and doesn't remove the shedding hair from my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Turner Tool

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Perfect size and the bristles are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Perfect size and the bristles are very soft. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine little brush that gets the job done. nicely made with good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Olimpia Gambacorta

customer_reviews.title: Creepy brush
customer_reviews.text: The brush is as advertised with the exception of what's stamped on the handle, 'From Russia with love'. Nowhere in the product pictures does it show that. I find it a little creepy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gresham

customer_reviews.title: NOT for removing SHED hair
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT help with removing shed pet hair at all ............ the bristles are too soft.
customer_reviews.author: just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a toy size dog with a soft coat and these bristles are gentle so she tolerates her brushing much better. The brush is also easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M

customer_reviews.title: which is nice.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see where it is cutting down on the shedding of my short hair pup. Bristles are soft though, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Moonpie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I probably didn't read the description carefully, but this brush is much smaller than I expected. It's not worth the trouble to return it and I'll find another use for it. At any rate, be warned.
customer_reviews.author: TheDudeAbides

customer_reviews.title: Kitties like it. Not to stiff for their sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Kitties like it. Not to stiff for their sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: George R

product_meta.title: Cat Grooming Brush and Dog Brush for Shedding Short Hair and Medium Length Hair. Excellent Deshedding Brush for Cats and Small/Medium Dogs. Wood with boar bristles for Shiny & Healthy Fur Coats!
product_meta.description:
Choosing the Right Brush for your Pet

We understand that it can be difficult to find the right home grooming brush for your pet, and we want to make it easy on you. With our natural reinforced genuine boar bristle brushes, it is easy to de-shed and smooth your pet’s fur.

Our brush is Most Suitable for the Following Types of Fur Coats:

Short, smooth coats: Retrievers, Hounds, Chihuahuas, etc

Short, wiry coats: Terriers, etc

Thin, delicate coats: Yorkies, Maltese, etc

Medium, Flowing Coats: Golden Retrievers, Spaniels, Setters, etc

Built to Last

Our brown boar bristle pet brush is 4.25 inches and is made in our factory in Russia that has been producing premium quality brushes since 1922. We believe in providing high-end products that will last for years without breaking or shedding.

Strengthen the Bond with Your Pet

A pet can become a man and woman’s best friend. Dogs and cats are loyal, brave, true, and always so happy to see you. It’s hard not to feel happy around your pet, right? Show your pet some extra love and appreciation with a good brushing session. They'll be in hog heaven, and your undeniable bond will continue to grow unbreakable.

Directions for Best Results:

Step 1) Brush down and out, away from your dog and cat’s skin. Make sure to brush in the direction the hair grows.

Step 2) Be extra gentle and careful to untangle any snarls. If you encounter mats, apply a coat conditioner or mat spray and leave it on for several minutes. Then use a wide-toothed comb or a mat-splitting tool to get through the tangle.

Step 3) We recommend brushing your dog and cat every couple of days for optimal grooming.

Get Your Premium Dog Brush Today and Experience the Difference a Boar Bristle Brush Makes! You May Even Consider Getting One For Your Best Friend Too!
feature_bullets: 🐶 GROOMING AT ITS FINEST! Let’s be honest, most of us want our beautiful pets to be a positive reflection of us. One of the easiest ways to keep your adorable dogs and cats looking healthy and well-groomed, is using LA Beauty Labs grooming brush on their fur coats. The boar bristles remove shedding hair and distribute natural oils to condition your pet’s fur coat. They can walk proudly with a beautiful, smooth, shiny fur coat!

💯 OUR BOAR BRISTLE BRUSHES WON’T SCRATCH… Unlike metal or nylon bristle brushes, our deluxe boar bristle brush won’t scratch, damage, or irritate your pet while brushing them. Make dog brushing a positive experience for you and your pet, using our premium boar bristle dog and cat brush. The extreme comfort and satisfaction derived is worth having the best brush!

❤️ YOUR PET WILL LOVE OUR BRUSH! It’s remarkable how similar pets are to humans. You know that face you make when you get an incredible massage or an amazing back scratch? And never wanting it to end? That’s how your dog and cat will feel while you brush them with our LA Beauty Labs pet brush! They will go into a state of complete relaxation and contentment. Make sure to take a picture of the expression on their face!

🎁 THE PERFECT GIFT FOR PET LOVERS! If you are shopping for friend who has a dog or cat that they treat like family, then you found the perfect gift with our pet brush! Our high-end Boar Bristle Pet Brush is the perfect thoughtful gift that your friend will love to use daily on her dog or cat. It’s actually really fun to use, and pets love how it feels!

🏅 ENJOY OUR “SHINY FUR COAT” GUARANTEE! At LA Beauty Labs, we are determined to providing you with the best quality products and experience. If your pet doesn’t love being brushed with our luxurious brushes, and if you don’t notice an improvement in the shine of your pet’s fur coat, then we will provide you a full money-back refund. You can get your dog and cat brush with total confidence, knowing we provide the best!
